#summary The major missing pieces in omapd.
#labels Featured

If you are interested in participating in the development of omapd please consider tackling something on this list.

Major missing features in omapd (in rough order of importance)
  # Persistent data store
  # Applying filters
   * delete filter
   * match-links
   * result-filter
  # Test suite to validate specification conformance
  # Loading run-time options from a config file
  # Metadata XML Validation
  # SSL support
  # MAP Client authentication
  # Running as a daemon
